members.excerpt: 1000+ Iyengars is my dream of recording, linking, and connecting generations across continents
RSK had a deep love for music and drama, he took his family and friends along in the railway saloon car or in his Bajaj side-car.
One of the founders of Bombay Stores, my granddad was a great admirer of success and entrepreneurship, not to mention a sincere love for cricket.
From burning down a post-office roof with firecrackers, to resilience, to entrepreneurship to asthama, my cousins and I, see these traits and more reflected though our generations in our family.
Confusion reigns in narratives about Seetha patti, often referred to as well as Rukhmini, who was her widowed sister, living with her.
Credited with finding the iron ore mines at Kudremukh, I invite you to find your links to him.
Inspirational story of being labelled an outcast for pursuing education.
